name: vs-code-quicklinks
title: VS Code Quicklinks
description: Create VS Code quicklinks for your projects.
author: pedro_dcc

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

commands.name: vs-code-quicklinks
commands.title: VS Code Quicklinks
commands.subtitle: Create
commands.description: Create VS Code quicklinks for your projects.
